Member Enumeration Documentation

enum kyotocabinet::FileDB::Error::Code

Error codes.

Enumerator:
SUCCESS 

success

NOIMPL 

not implemented

INVALID 

invalid operation

NOFILE 

file not found

NOPERM 

no permission

BROKEN 

broken file

DUPREC 

record duplication

NOREC 

no record

LOGIC 

logical inconsistency

SYSTEM 

system error

MISC 

miscellaneous error
